trans-unit.target: TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_SEQ_00<tab>Jihli Aliapoh is looking for someone to help make a dream come true. ※This quest is available for a limited time only.

TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_SEQ_01<tab>As dependably as eggs fall from a laying hen, this year's Hatching<var 1F /var>tide festivities are being overseen by none other than Jihli Aliapoh, whose ambitions extend further than ever before. She describes to you her dream of a goobbue upon a stage in Ul'dah, and details her plan to hold a tandem celebration of both Hatching<var 1F /var>tide and Little Ladies' Day which will spread joy across two of Eorzea's city-states. However, she must first convince the planners of Little Ladies' Day that the goobbue performer she hired poses no danger to the people. The royal seneschal has traveled from Ul'dah on behalf of his peers, and Jihli has instructed you both to visit Bentbranch Meadows, where the goobbue is even now delivering joy to all and sundry.
※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.

TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_SEQ_02<tab>After being dazzled by the masterful display of Aldemund's goobbue companion, Peatie, the royal seneschal is convinced that she would be the perfect fit for Little Ladies' Day. She must first win the hearts of the people of Gridania, however, and for that Aldemund requires your aid. It seems Peatie suffers from a minor case of stage fright, and Aldemund would have you ride on the goobbue's head to reassure her as she delivers smiles to the people.
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_SEQ_03<tab>Peatie shows no sign of discontent as you mount her head. Now, the people of Gridania await to have the spirit of Hatching<var 1F /var>tide stirred within them.

TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_SEQ_04<tab>The sound of cheers can be heard reverberating throughout Bentbranch Meadows, a clear indication of Peatie's successful performance. Aldemund will undoubtedly wish to hear of this favorable outcome.

TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_SEQ_05<tab>You arrive to see Aldemund's store of eggs depleted─a true sign that Peatie's show made a splash. Although Aldemund believes her place on Ul'dah's stage is secured, the final decision comes down to the judgment of the royal seneschal.
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Aldemund at Bentbranch Meadows.
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Aldemund and mount Peatie.
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_TODO_02<tab>Mount Peatie and give the Gridanian citizens an egg surprise.
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Aldemund.

TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_NONOTTA_000_001<tab>Hatching<var 1F /var>tide is come once more, and I daresay we may've outdone ourselves this time! It all hinges on whether we can see Mistress Aliapoh's dream realized...
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_BUTLER_000_002<tab>Ah, come to enjoy the Hatching<var 1F /var>tide festivities, have you?
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_010<tab>Welcome, my friend! I take it the Hatching<var 1F /var>tide decorations have caught your eye?

TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_011<tab>Oh, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, is that really you? I had hoped I might see you again, but I did not dare assume. Nonetheless, it warms my heart that you are eager to revel in Hatching<var 1F /var>tide once more.

TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_012<tab>It warms my heart to greet yet another reveler, for I am the host of this event─Jihli Aliapoh, at your humble service. If I'm not mistaken, you're an adventurer, yes? Might I have your name?

TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_013<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>...a festive name, to be sure. I hope that you shall find all things Hatching<var 1F /var>tide to your liking─in fact, I <var 1A 02 /var>know<var 1A 01 /var> you shall!

TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_014<tab>For I have seen it in a dream clear as the one I had many moons ago, where the Twelve Archons delivered unto me a prophecy which inspired this occasion. I have worked tirelessly since that night to do their words justice.

TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_015<tab>This year, it was again a dream that sparked my imagination...a dream of a goobbue, massive and marvelous, standing upon the stage where else but in Ul'dah, so many malms away!
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_016<tab>Wreathed in radiant flowers of pink, the darling goobbue held in her hands an egg decorated most lavishly.
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_NONOTTA_100_017<tab>And there is but one time of year when the sandy brown of that city is accented by peach blossoms in full bloom. Yes, I speak of Little Ladies' Day!

TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_NONOTTA_000_018<tab>The message of Mistress Aliapoh's dream was clear: combine the spirit of Hatching<var 1F /var>tide and Little Ladies' Day to create the most eggciting day that jewel of a city has seen! Naturally, we sought out those in charge of the event and brought our proposal before them.
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_BUTLER_000_019<tab>'Tis a pleasure as always, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I see ours is not the only celebration which can boast of your selfless assistance.

TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_BUTLER_000_020<tab>'Tis a pleasure to make your acquaintance, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I have the honor of acting as this year's <var 1A 02 /var>royal<var 1A 01 /var> seneschal, and it is my duty to bring smiles and cheers to all the ladies of the realm.
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_BUTLER_000_021<tab>What is Little Ladies' Day, you ask? Why, it is a day when the maidens of Eorzea are doted upon as princesses by their very own loyal seneschal!

TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_BUTLER_000_022<tab>Mistress Aliapoh's proposal was quite unprecedented. And so confident was she in her vision that she had already secured the services of a performer and his goobbue companion <var 1A 02 /var>before<var 1A 01 /var> meeting with us.

TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_BUTLER_000_023<tab>I regret to say not all in Ul'dah share in her conviction. Many doubt the safety of such an act, which has brought our plans for Little Ladies' Day to a standstill.
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_BUTLER_000_024<tab>The trepidation is not without cause, mind you. Some fifteen years ago, a supposedly tame goobbue ran amok in the city streets, causing untold harm.

TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_NONOTTA_000_027<tab>When the seneschal informed us of these circumstances, I got to thinking: we could hold a Hatching<var 1F /var>tide event here in Gridania, with a goobbue as the main attraction!

TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_NONOTTA_000_028<tab>Not only would this lift the spirits of Gridania's people, but it would prove to those in Ul'dah that the goobbue poses no danger. Surely that would put any doubts to rest!

TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_029<tab>In fact, the performers have already arrived! Nonotta and I were treated to a display of their show, and I must say, never have I seen a goobbue so pretty and sweet.

TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_BUTLER_000_030<tab>Out of all the paths forward we could have taken, this seemed to be the only one which might please all parties. I came to Gridania at once so I could act as a witness for my peers in Ul'dah.

TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_BUTLER_000_033<tab>Since you're here, might you accompany me to the show? Someone as well versed in this realm's beastkin as you may be singularly qualified to tell us just how docile this goobbue is.
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_A1_000_001<tab>I expect quite a few eggs for my troubles.
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_A1_000_002<tab>Well, I'd hate to see Miss Aliapoh's dream shattered...
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_BUTLER_000_034<tab>Eggs...? Quite an unusual form of payment, but I believe Mistress Aliapoh has plenty...
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_BUTLER_000_035<tab>Regardless, the look on your face says you agree to my proposal. Many thanks, and I look forward to what is sure to be a fascinating show!
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_BUTLER_000_036<tab>As would I! While I'm certain that there is nothing to fear, having a stout arm by my side will be most reassuring.
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_JIHLIALIAPOH_100_036<tab>Well then, all is settled. The show of a lifetime awaits at Bentbranch Meadows─you had best not tarry.
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_BUTLER_000_037<tab>Agreed. Let us make our way there and speak with Aldemund, the performer in charge. Oh, I can hardly wait!

TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_040<tab>The adorable goobbue is even now delivering eggtastic cheer to all in Bentbranch Meadows. Go there and speak with Aldemund─I'm sure he shall be most eager to treat you to their show.
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_NONOTTA_000_041<tab>I went to visit the goobbue along with Mistress Aliapoh. I must say, I never realized just how adorable they could be.
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_BUTLER_000_042<tab>I...I don't believe I've ever been this close to one before...
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_PDYGOOBBUE04810_000_043<tab>...Grrr?
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_ALDEMUND_000_050<tab>Oh, didn't see you there. Can we help you?

TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_BUTLER_000_051<tab>Greetings. I am the royal seneschal, in charge of making Little Ladies' Day most memorable for all ladies of the realm. Mistress Aliapoh has informed us that you have quite the show prepared for us.
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_ALDEMUND_000_053<tab>Ah, we've been waitin' for you! You'll be hard-pressed to pick your jaw up off the floor after you see what my Peatie has in store for you.

TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_ALDEMUND_000_054<tab>I've been watchin' over her ever since the day I found her wanderin' the wilderness all by her lonesome. We spent ages lookin' for her family, but now I s'pose we're all each other has.
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_BUTLER_000_055<tab>Peatie? A lovely name, to be sure. And those flowers, are they peach blossoms? I daresay she is the very picture of a Little Ladies' Day princess!
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_ALDEMUND_000_056<tab>Haha, I'm glad to hear that, and I know Peatie is, too. She's thought of little else since the moment Miss Aliapoh came to us with her peculiar request.

TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_ALDEMUND_000_057<tab>There's nothin' in this world we love more than hearin' an audience cheer, and I think this time we'll earn that and then some. We call this one “egg surprise.” Go on, Peatie!
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_BUTLER_000_058<tab>That was...astounding!
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_ALDEMUND_000_059<tab>Impressive, ain't it? And all it took was a few glamour prisms. 'Course, that wasn't where the genius was required.

TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_ALDEMUND_000_061<tab>It took us days and nights of rackin' our brains to figure out how to capture the spirit of <var 1A 02 /var>two<var 1A 01 /var> celebrations. In the end, though, I think we did about as good a job as could've been expected.

TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_ALDEMUND_000_062<tab>Now here comes the rub. Ever since we arrived in Gridania, Peatie's been a little on edge. Hate to see her like this, but I think I've figured out what's causin' it.

TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_ALDEMUND_000_063<tab>As you just saw, she's got no problem performin' in front of an audience of two. But when a whole gaggle of revelers showed up not too long ago, she just froze up.
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_BUTLER_000_064<tab>I see... She must not be used to such large crowds.
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_ALDEMUND_000_065<tab>Luckily, I managed to save the show by climbin' atop her head. That set her mind at ease and helped her find her courage.
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_ALDEMUND_100_065<tab>But I ain't as young as I used to be, and my knees are already cryin' out in protest at the prospect of climbin' her again.

TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_ALDEMUND_000_066<tab>But you, on the other hand...I reckon you've got plenty of malms left in those adventurer's legs of yours. Might I trouble you to join our merry troupe and support Peatie durin' her star turn?

TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_ALDEMUND_000_067<tab>All you have to do is climb atop her and head toward the crowds. Show them our act, and tell the spectators to come to me for an egg of their own. Still plenty to go around.

TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_BUTLER_000_070<tab>If Peatie's act is a hit in Gridania, it would do much to allay the concerns of my Ul'dahn compatriots. Best of luck, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_PDYGOOBBUE04810_000_071<tab>Grrr! Grooo!
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_SYSTEM_000_072<tab>Peatie is eager to get her show on the road. Speak with Aldemund to ride her.
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_ALDEMUND_000_075<tab>Trust me, Peatie'll love havin' you aboard. Now's our chance to get these eggs into the hands of the eager Gridanians.

TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_ALDEMUND_000_076<tab>She's too timid to wander off on her own, so if somethin' else demands your attention, she'll make her way back to me. Now get out there, and give Gridania an egg surprise!
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_MAN04810_000_080<tab>What...what did I just see!?
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_MAN04810_000_081<tab>Ah, this must be that performing goobbue I heard so much about. Good show, good show! I think I'll get an egg of my own to remember this by!
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_MAN04810_000_082<tab>They said the show was over here, didn't they?
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_SYSTEM_000_083<tab>Mount Peatie and perform an egg surprise before spectators to spread Hatching<var 1F /var>tide cheer throughout Bentbranch Meadows.
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_GIRL04810_000_084<tab>That was amazing! The rabbits were so adorable!
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_GIRL04810_000_085<tab>And that crown of peach blossoms is so pretty! I wonder if they give them out with the eggs... Let's go find out!
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_GIRL04810_000_086<tab>I don't see any eggs... Is this the right place?
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_SYSTEM_000_087<tab>Mount Peatie and perform an egg surprise before spectators to spread Hatching<var 1F /var>tide cheer throughout Bentbranch Meadows.
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_GENTLEMAN04810_000_088<tab>Oh my stars! What manner of─
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_GENTLEMAN04810_000_089<tab>Oh... You're promoting Hatching<var 1F /var>tide? Yes, yes...I knew that, of course.

TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_GENTLEMAN04810_000_090<tab>Splendid trick that was, truly. I never knew goobbues to be adept at anything besides eating, but you've expanded my horizons. Mayhap I'll partake in the festivities this year after all...
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_GENTLEMAN04810_000_091<tab>I heard the Hatching<var 1F /var>tide festivities would be held here this year, but I've seen nothing out of the ordinary...
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_SYSTEM_000_092<tab>Mount Peatie and perform an egg surprise before spectators to spread Hatching<var 1F /var>tide cheer throughout Bentbranch Meadows.
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_SYSTEM_000_093<tab>The spirit of Hatching<var 1F /var>tide is alive in Gridania. Return to Aldemund and tell him of Peatie's courageous performances.
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_ALDEMUND_000_094<tab>Ah, there you are. Peatie's itchin' to show her stuff to Gridania's citizens, so just hop right back on her whenever you're ready.
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_BUTLER_000_095<tab>This just might work...
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_PDYGOOBBUE04810_000_096<tab>Groooaaah...
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_SYSTEM_000_097<tab>While Peatie's expression is inscrutable, you sense gratitude radiating from her. She seems to have enjoyed herself.
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_ALDEMUND_000_100<tab>Good work, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Same goes for you, Peatie! I could hardly pass around the eggs fast enough!
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_PDYGOOBBUE04810_100_100<tab>Graaarrr!
TEXT_FESPDY901_04810_ALDEMUND_000_101<tab>And it looks like Peatie's managed to conquer her fears. Let's hope these ovations are enough to conquer the seneschal's.
